levelList.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 50% of the HP damage dealt (max 50)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 60 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every 6 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain +3 [Laceration] Count
[WhenUse] <style="highlight">Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on the target (max 2)</style>
[WhenUse] Gain 5 [Laceration]
- At 50%+ HP, gain 10 additional [Laceration] and +1 [Laceration] Count
levelList.name: Sewing

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If the target has [LineCuttingPersonality], inflict +1 [Laceration] Count<style="highlight"></style>
[OnSucceedAttack] If the target has [LineCuttingPersonality], inflict +1 [Laceration] Count<style="highlight"></style>

levelList.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 100% of the HP damage dealt (max 100)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 60 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every 6 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain +3 [Laceration] Count
[WhenUse] If the target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1<style="highlight"></style>

- At 50%+ HP, gain 10 additional [Laceration] and +1 [Laceration] Count
levelList.name: Scission

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If the target has 6 or less [Laceration] Count, inflict +2 [Laceration] Count
[OnSucceedAttack] If the target has 6 or less [Laceration] Count, inflict +2 [Laceration] Count
[OnSucceedAttack] If the target has 10 or less [Laceration] Count, inflict +4 [Laceration] Count

levelList.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 100% of the HP damage dealt (max 125)
[BeforeAttack] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], Atk Weight +1
<style="highlight">- At 20+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], replace the above effect with Atk Weight +2 instead</style>
[WhenUse] If the target has 5+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 3 [Laceration] on the target (max 3)
[EndSkill] Consume <style="highlight">10</style> [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] for every Atk Weight gained
[EndSkill] If the target is killed, increase [BloodDinner] by <style="highlight">20</style>. Regain half of [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] consumed by this Skill (Max twice per turn)
<style="highlight">- If the target is [LineCuttingPersonality], additionally increase [BloodDinner] by 20 more, and gain 5 [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] (Max twice per turn)</style>
levelList.name: I'll Make You a New Dress!

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], deal +([BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] x <style="highlight">5</style>)% more damage (max <style="highlight">95</style>%)
- At 20+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], deal +([BloodScissorPersonalityFirst] x <style="highlight">8</style>)% more damage instead (max <style="highlight">240</style>%)

levelList.desc:

- At 20+ [BloodScissorPersonalityFirst], gain Base Power +2 instead</style>
